SEARCH
程序包 appDomain

类 WordTracker

java.lang.Object
appDomain.WordTracker
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class WordTracker extends Object implements Serializable
The WordTracker class provides a way to track word occurrences across multiple files. It uses a binary search tree (BST) to store word entries, allowing efficient word lookup and management. Each word entry tracks its occurrences in specific files and lines. The class supports reading files, generating reports, and persisting/reloading the tracker state.

  • 方法详细资料

    • processFile

      public void processFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      Processes a file to extract words and record their occurrences.
      参数:
      fileName - the path of the file to process
      抛出:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport(String format, PrintStream output)
      Generates a report of word occurrences in a specified format and outputs it to the given stream.
      参数:
      format - the report format ("-pf", "-pl", "-po" are supported)
      output - the stream to write the report to

    • saveRepository

      public void saveRepository(String fileName) throws IOException
      Saves the current state of the WordTracker to a file.
      参数:
      fileName - the name of the file to save the state to
      抛出:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the file

    • loadRepository

      public static WordTracker loadRepository(String fileName)
      Loads a WordTracker state from a file. If the file does not exist or an error occurs, a new WordTracker instance is returned.
      参数:
      fileName - the name of the file to load the state from
      返回:
      the loaded WordTracker instance, or a new instance if the file is not found or an error occurs
